dspxmcFaultStatus Struct Reference
CSL ARCH Module » C66x » XMC

This structure is returned by DSPXMCGetFaultStatus APIs. More...

#include <dsp_xmc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t localAccess

Detailed Description

This structure is returned by DSPXMCGetFaultStatus APIs.

Field Documentation

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::fid

ID of initiator who caused the fault - Valid if localAccess = FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::localAccess

Access was made locally by DSP - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::supvModeExec

SUPERVISOR mode EXECUTE permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::supvModeRead

SUPERVISOR mode READ permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::supvModeWrite

SUPERVISOR mode WRITE permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::userModeExec

USER mode EXECUTE permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::userModeRead

USER mode READ permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE

uint32_t dspxmcFaultStatus::userModeWrite

USER mode WRITE permissions - Value is TRUE/FALSE
